survey_brief: This survey aims to understand employee preferences and behaviors regarding sustainable office supplies in corporate environments.

questions.question_text: How often do you use sustainable office supplies (e.g., recycled paper, biodegradable pens) at work?
questions.routing_logic: This question is always shown first.
questions.client_notes: Use a simple frequency scale to gauge adoption rates. Ensure mobile-friendly radio buttons.

script.question_text: How often do you use sustainable office supplies (e.g., recycled paper, biodegradable pens) at work?
script.routing_logic: This question is always shown first.

questions.question_text: Which of the following sustainable office supplies do you currently use? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Only shown if Q1 is not 'Never'.
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice allows respondents to indicate specific preferences. Limit to 5 options for clarity.

script.question_text: Which of the following sustainable office supplies do you currently use? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Only shown if Q1 is not 'Never'.

questions.question_text: What factors influence your choice to use sustainable office supplies?
questions.routing_logic: Only shown if Q1 is not 'Never'.
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional insights.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE (radio buttons) with an optional open-text follow-up for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What factors influence your choice to use sustainable office supplies?
script.routing_logic: Only shown if Q1 is not 'Never'.

questions.question_text: Please describe any challenges you face when trying to use sustainable office supplies.
questions.routing_logic: Optional follow-up for Q3 if 'Other' is selected.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended responses can reveal barriers (e.g., budget, accessibility).

script.question_text: Please describe any challenges you face when trying to use sustainable office supplies.
script.routing_logic: Optional follow-up for Q3 if 'Other' is selected.

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend sustainable office supplies to colleagues? (Scale: 1-5, where 1 = Not at all likely, 5 = Extremely likely)
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for measurable sentiment analysis.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend sustainable office supplies to colleagues? (Scale: 1-5, where 1 = Not at all likely, 5 = Extremely likely)
